sentence.Network_en: In all seriousness, there is nothing else I can do.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以非常诚恳地说，我没有其他能做的。

sentence.Network_en: "This is not good," he said with great seriousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他特别严肃地说：“这可不好。”

sentence.Network_en: They had shown a commitment and seriousness of purpose.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已经立下承诺，并表达了想要实现目标的诚意。

entry.tran: 严重的;危急的;令人担忧的
entry.def: Serious problems or situations are very bad and cause people to be worried or afraid.

example.ex: Crime is an increasingly serious problem in Russian society...
example.tran: 犯罪猖獗是俄罗斯社会面临的一个日益严重的问题。

example.ex: The government still face very serious difficulties...
example.tran: 政府仍然面临着非常严峻的困难。

entry.tran: 重要的;需要认真考虑的;严肃的
entry.def: Serious matters are important and deserve careful and thoughtful consideration.

example.ex: I regard this as a serious matter...
Don't laugh boy. This is serious.

entry.def: When important matters are dealt with in a serious way, they are given careful and thoughtful consideration.

example.ex: My parents never really faced up to my drug use in any serious way...
example.tran: 我父母从未认真地正视过我的吸毒问题。

example.ex: It was a question which deserved serious consideration.
example.tran: 这是一个值得认真考虑的问题。

entry.tran: (音乐、文学作品)严肃的，非供消遣(或娱乐)的
entry.def: Serious music or literature requires concentration to understand or appreciate it.

example.ex: There is no point reviewing a blockbuster as you might review a serious novel.
example.tran: 为一部大片写影评时，没必要像为一部严肃小说写书评那样认真谨慎。

entry.tran: 认真的;当真的;真心的;郑重其事的
entry.def: If someone is serious about something, they are sincere about what they are saying, doing, or intending to do.

example.ex: You really are serious about this, aren't you?...
example.tran: 你这话的确是发自内心的，是不是？

entry.tran: (人)若有所思的，庄重的，严肃的
entry.def: Serious people are thoughtful and quiet, and do not laugh very often.

example.tran: 他是一个非常一本正经的人。

example.ex: She looked at me with big, serious eyes.
example.tran: 她睁大眼睛若有所思地看着我。

entry.def: Serious money is a very large amount of money.

example.ex: He started earning serious money only in the sixties.
example.tran: 他在 60 年代才开始挣大钱。

means.word_mean: 2. the quality of arousing fear or distress;

sentences.sentence: "he learned the seriousness of his illness"
"a lack of solemnity is not necessarily a lack of seriousness"- Robert Rice

auth_sentence.content: The seriousness of this incident meant an immediate investigation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The seriousness of this incident meant an immediate investigation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The seriousness of this incident meant an immediate investigation.

auth_sentence.content: Many residents conceded that they underestimated Sandy's seriousness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many residents conceded that they underestimated Sandy's seriousness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many residents conceded that they underestimated Sandy's seriousness.

auth_sentence.content: They can see the seriousness of the international community.
auth_sentence.res_content: They can see the seriousness of the international community.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They can see the seriousness of the international community.

sentences.en: He was beginning to understand the seriousness of life.
sentences.cn: 他渐渐地懂得了生活的严肃性。

sentences.en: The joke did not obscure the underlying seriousness of his point.
sentences.cn: 玩笑并没有掩盖他的观点隐含的严肃性。

sentences.en: She spoke with great seriousness of the hardships she had endured.
sentences.cn: 她非常严肃地讲述了自己经历的苦难。

sentences.en: He maintained an attitude of high seriousness.
sentences.cn: 他保持了极为认真的态度。

sentences.en: Only later did he realize the full seriousness of his offence.
sentences.cn: 他后来才意识到他的罪行有多严重。

sentences.en: Everybody recognized the seriousness of the situation.
sentences.cn: 谁都看出了局势的严重性。

sentences.en: He didn’t realize the seriousness of her illness.
sentences.cn: 他没有认识到她病情的严重性。

sentences.en: The sudden summoning of the Cabinet underlines the seriousness of the situation.
sentences.cn: 内阁会议的突然召开,突出了局势的严重性。

sentences.en: They will change their tune when they find out the seriousness of the problem.
sentences.cn: 当发现问题的严重性时,他们会改变态度的。

sentences.en: When he summed up, the judge reminded the jury of the seriousness of the case.
sentences.cn: 法官在概述证据时提醒陪审团注意案件的严重性。

sentences.en: The doctor,not wishing to make her nervous,did not fully explain the seriousness of her condition.
sentences.cn: 大夫不愿意使她紧张,没有充分给她说明病情的严重性。

sentences.en: I didn’t realize the true seriousness of the country’s problems until I went there myself.
sentences.cn: 我亲自到了那里之后才体会到这个国家各种问题的实际严重性。

sentences.en: As time went on,people came to be aware of the seriousness of China’s population.
sentences.cn: 随着岁月的流逝,人们逐渐地认识到中国的人口问题的严重性。

sentences.en: He hasn’t yet woken up to the seriousness of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他还没有认识到形势有多严峻。

sentences.en: Surely you’re not telling me, in all seriousness, that you want to work in a factory for the rest of your life!
sentences.cn: 你当真是说你愿意一辈子都在工厂干下去，不是开玩笑吧！
